# Ideas Category

**Purpose:** Feature suggestions, brainstorming, and improvement ideas.

**Guidelines:**
- One idea per discussion
- Start with problem statement
- Propose concrete solution
- Consider implementation complexity

**Template:**
```
## Problem
[What problem are you trying to solve?]

## Proposed Solution
[Your idea/suggestion]

## Benefits
- [Benefit 1]
- [Benefit 2]

## Potential Drawbacks/Challenges
- [Challenge 1]
- [Challenge 2]

## Implementation Considerations
[Technical thoughts on how to implement]
```

**Note:** Ideas may be moved to GitHub Issues if they become actionable features.
